title: noche
author: noche
content: Hi all, what means 2e-8 BTC total income???Thanks in advance.Best regards.

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: Quote from: noche on November 22, 2023, 11:46:14 AMHi all, what means 2e-8 BTC total income???Could you share where you get it, on what platform, please?That looks a bit tricky and can cause a user makes mistakes and loses money. I don't like any platform displays a user balance like this.Btw, you can take this chance to learn more about Bitcoin units.[Did you know?] Bitcoin Table of UnitsUseful conversionshttps://www.btcsatoshi.com/https://bitcoindata.science/bitcoin-units-converter

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: tranthidung on November 22, 2023, 01:35:12 PMCould you share where you get it, on what platform, please?It seems that preev.com understands what exactly 2e-8 in BTC if you paste it there you will get the exact result as Dave posted above

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: DaveF on November 22, 2023, 11:50:57 AM2e-8 is 0.00000002So you have BTC0.00000002It sounds much bigger than it really is, and I guess number 8 means there is 8 zeros in this number and it's easier to read it like this.There are even some scientific calculators that can calculate this, but they can give different results based on interpretation.

comments.author: BlackHatCoiner
comments.body: Remember it like this: e-8 = exponential -8. It's 10^-8, so 2e-8 = 2 * 10^-8.
